name: Fallen London - Highlight 'Best' options
description:
This style highlights the Go button in orange for the 'best' option on certain Cards because I keep clicking the wrong option.

This style works with the June 2018 redesign.
css:
@-moz-document domain("fallenlondon.com") {
/* Highlight 'Best' option */
div[data-branch-id="17047"] .button--primary, /* The Paronomastic Newshound - Talk to him about the Tomb-Colonies */
div[data-branch-id="5582"] .button--primary, /* The High Castle: What Occurs in a Rooftop Shack - Talk to a friend of a friend */
div[data-branch-id="7970"] .button--primary, /* Once upon a time in a carriage - Offer her a lift */
div[data-branch-id="8055"] .button--primary, /* The Life of Crime - Your cut of the take */
div[data-branch-id="7999"] .button--primary, /* Your Edifice of Black Stone- Rent out your gymnasium to ring-fighters */   
div[data-branch-id="51093"] .button--primary, /* An Implausible Penance - Pugilism and politics */
div[data-branch-id="5780"] .button--primary, /* An Implausible Penance - Pugilism and politics - Beating the minister */
div[data-branch-id="5369"] .button--primary, /* An Implausible Penance - The Smugglers' Grave - Try to glimpse a notorious smuggler */
div[data-branch-id="8045"] .button--primary, /* A commotion above! - Wine! */
div[data-branch-id="5401"] .button--primary, /* (Airs 26-75) Making your Name: Duelling the Black Ribbon - Arrange a duel outside the Black Ribbon */
div[data-branch-id="172799"] .button--primary, /* (Airs 33-67) Working for the Widow - Attend an audience with the Gracious Widow */
div[data-branch-id="129439"] .button--primary, /* (Airs 26-50) Life on Ladybones Road - A furtive duo seeks your expertise concerning tattoos... */
div[data-branch-id="129441"] .button--primary, /* (Airs 26-50) A furtive duo seeks your expertise concerning tattoos... - Make educated guesses */
div[data-branch-id="173620"] .button--primary, /* (Airs 0-25) Opportunism in Spite - Confound the Constables */
div[data-branch-id="4877"] .button--primary /* (Airs 0-25) Confound the Constables - A riskier option: hide in a rookery */
{ 
  background-color: #db8e00 !important;  }
}
